parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.55

</value></part><part><name>game2</name>=<value> tkoh

</value></part><part><name>version2</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>game3</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version3</name>=<value> 0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> System

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> GUI Control - Positioning

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Returns an array containing all information about current client screen resolution.

<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3 </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> '''Render resolution''' is not returned by this command.<br>
A sampling setting of '''50%''' means half of native width ''and'' half of native height, resulting in a render resolution of '''''25%''''' the original resolution.</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> important </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> The engine default value for <tt>fovTop</tt> is '''0.75''' in case it is needed to calculate difference with custom FOV.</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> The <tt>aspectRatio</tt> is calculated as <tt>fovLeft&nbsp;/&nbsp;fovTop</tt> and should be the same as <tt>screenW&nbsp;/&nbsp;screenH</tt> for undistorted image if the FOV is custom. Some of the common values:
{<template><title>!</title></template> class<template><title>=</title></template>"wikitable"
! 16/9 !! 16/10 !! 5/4 !! 4/3 !! 16/9 triple screen
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>-
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 1.777777(…) <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> 1.6 <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> 1.25 <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> 1.333333(…) <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> 5.333333(…)
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>}
</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[getResolution]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Array]] - <tt>[screenW, screenH, viewPortW, viewPortH, aspectRatio, uiScale, fovTop, fovLeft, tripleHead]</tt><br>
* <tt>screenW</tt>: [[Number]] - width of the screen in pixels
* <tt>screenH</tt>: [[Number]] - height of the screen in pixels
* <tt>viewPortW</tt>: [[Number]] - width of the '''4:3''' view port in pixels
* <tt>viewPortH</tt>: [[Number]] - height of the '''4:3''' view port in pixels 
* <tt>aspectRatio</tt>: [[Number]] - screen aspect ratio
* <tt>uiScale</tt>: [[Number]] - the scale of the UI, which affects view port size:
: {<template><title>!</title></template> class<template><title>=</title></template>"wikitable" style<template><title>=</title></template>"margin-top: -0.5em"
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>+ Arma 3
! Very Small !! Small !! Normal !! Large !! Very Large
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>-
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 0.47 <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> 0.55 <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> 0.7 <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> 0.85 <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> 1
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>}
* <tt>fovTop</tt>: [[Number]] - vertical FOV in [[rad | radians]], the same as <tt>fovTop</tt> value from the user profile (<template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.94.145947</value></part></template>)
* <tt>fovLeft</tt>: [[Number]] - horizontal FOV in [[rad | radians]], the same as<tt>fovLeft</tt> value from the user profile (<template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.94.145947</value></part></template>)
* <tt>tripleHead</tt>: [[Boolean]] - [[true]] if user has triple head screen (see also [[safeZoneXAbs]], [[safeZoneWAbs]]) (<template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.94.145947</value></part></template>)

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_res = [[getResolution]]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>a 16/9 single monitor setup</value></part></template></code>
<code>[
	1360,		<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>width</value></part></template>
	768,		<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>height</value></part></template>
	867,		<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>2D viewport width</value></part></template>
	653,		<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>2D viewport height</value></part></template>
	1.77778,	<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>aspect ratio</value></part></template>
	0.85		<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>UI scale</value></part></template>
]</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_res = [[getResolution]];  <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>dedicated server</value></part></template></code>
<code>[
	160,		<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>width</value></part></template>
	120,		<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>height</value></part></template>
	136,		<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>2D viewport width</value></part></template>
	102,		<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>2D viewport height</value></part></template>
	1.33333,	<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>aspect ratio</value></part></template>
	0.85		<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>UI scale</value></part></template>
]</code>
</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>_res = [[getResolution]]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>a triple 16/9 monitor setup</value></part></template></code>
<code>[
	5760,		<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>width</value></part></template>
	1080,		<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>height</value></part></template>
	792,		<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>2D viewport width</value></part></template>
	594,		<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>2D viewport height</value></part></template>
	5.33333,	<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>aspect ratio</value></part></template>
	0.55		<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>UI scale</value></part></template>
]</code>

</value></part><part><name>x4</name>=<value> <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.94.145947</value></part></template>:<code>_res = [[getResolution]]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>16/9 monitor setup</value></part></template></code>
<code>[
	1920,		<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>width</value></part></template>
	1080,		<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>height</value></part></template>
	792,		<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>2D viewport width</value></part></template>
	594,		<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>2D viewport height</value></part></template>
	1.77778,	<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>aspect ratio</value></part></template>
	0.55,		<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>UI scale</value></part></template>
	0.75,		<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>fovTop</value></part></template>
	1.33333,	<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>fovLeft</value></part></template>
	false		<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tripleHead</value></part></template>
]</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[getObjectFOV]], [[worldToScreen]], [[screenToWorld]], [[safeZoneX]], [[safeZoneY]], [[safeZoneW]], [[safeZoneH]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on  05:38, 20 December 2010</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Tom 48 97|tom_48_97]]</dt>
<dd class="note">This command can be useful to play a video (see this function [[BIS_fnc_playVideo]]) in the given format if you have compiled it for different UI scale.</dd>
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl></root>
